title: Proloquo2Go - Symbol-based AAC - 3.0.5 [iOS] - ReSeed 2016-07
description:
I have used this copy for many months without any problems, as no torrents still exist for any versions I thought it best to re-seed this for the people who might not have the money to buy it but have access to a jailbroken iPad device.

Description:

Proloquo2GoÂ® is an award-winning symbol-supported communication app providing a voice to over 100,000 individuals around the world who are unable to speak.

â€œUsers can open Proloquo2Go and begin to use it for effective communication immediately.â€ â€“ Susan Berkowitz, MS-SLP, AAC Consultant.

First released in 2009, Proloquo2Goâ€™s research-based vocabularies, highly customizable features, natural sounding voices, and unique innovations make it the premier Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) solution for children and adults with autism, cerebral palsy, Down syndrome, developmental disabilities, apraxia, stroke, or traumatic brain injury.

Communicate with ease
â€¢ Speak by tapping buttons with words or phrases
â€¢ Access grammar efficiently with automatic verb and noun inflections
â€¢ Repeat spoken messages and create buttons from the current message 

Choose a vocabulary that fits
â€¢ Start early with Basic Communication vocabulary for beginning communicators
â€¢ Support language development with research-based Core Word vocabulary 
â€¢ Modify a default vocabulary or create your own vocabulary design

Grow along with the user
â€¢ Expand vocabulary by changing grid size
â€¢ Quickly customize for individual needs and interests using VocaPriorityâ„¢
â€¢ Transition to literacy with word prediction-supported typing view

Customize to fit
â€¢ Create and edit grids and buttons as desired

Edit with ease
â€¢ Change color, font, and voice of multiple buttons at once
â€¢ Move buttons with drag and drop
â€¢ Copy and paste buttons between vocabularies

Access for users with motor impairments
â€¢ Prevent accidental selections with hold duration
â€¢ Use Select on Release to compensate for fine-motor challenges

Speak with a natural voice
â€¢ Download free natural-sounding TTS voices, including genuine childrenâ€™s voices
